summary: An indigenous clan-based people living in harmony with nature find their way of life threatened when violent interlopers from another culture arrive, intent on seizing their natural resources and enslaving them.
cast: Nolay Piho|Chih-Hsiang Ma|Masanobu Andô|Sabu Kawahara|Vivian Hsu|Mei-Ling Lo|Landy Wen|Da-Ching|Pawan Nawi|Yakau Kuhon|Pawan Neyung|Yuan-Jie Lin|Chih-Wei Cheng|Yi-Fan Hsu|Soda Voyu|Hayung Gaki|Bayan Kenbo|Gaki Baunky|Laka Umaw|Yong-cheng Kao|Teymu Boru|Bagah Pawan|Chao-Ming Chin|Yawei Basang|Sabulo|Wei-cheng Chuang|Jiru Taylung|Tudaw Macang|Yumin Silan|Idi Tusang|Suyan Masing|Yûichi Kimura|Jun'ichi Haruta|Minoru Matsumoto|Sonrei Yoshioka|Ju-Lung Ma|Chie Tanaka|Chi-Wei Cheng|Pong Fong Wu|Dean Fujioka|Michio Hayashida|Akira Hibino|Yoshitaka Ishizuka|Yukihiko Kageyama|Kenji Kasai|Junji Kumagai|Hiroshi Noguchi|Yukiya Oonishi|Shiang-Chu Tang|Chun Tin|Masaru Yoshitake|Qiusheng Zeng

title: Sai de ke · ba lai: Tai yang qi
